firstNightReminder: The Alphabetizer points to two players. Point to the one whose name comes first alphabetically.
otherNightReminder: The Alphabetizer points to two players. Point to the one whose name comes first alphabetically.
name: Alphabetizer
ability: Each night choose 2 players, you learn which comes first alphabetically.

otherNightReminder: The Recruit points to an alive player: if they are an outsider then mark them with a Militia token. Before the next day, inform them who the Recruit is and that they are Militia.
name: Recruit
ability: Each night*, choose an alive player: if they are an outsider, they become a Militia and become your alignment. The Militia learns who the Recruit is that night. [+1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: If the Hitman has not yet used their ability: the Hitman either shakes their head 'no' or they point to a player and guess a good character they are. If correct, that player dies otherwise the Hitman dies.
otherNightReminder: If the Hitman has not yet used their ability: the Hitman either shakes their head 'no' or they point to a player and guess a good character they are. If correct, that player dies otherwise the Hitman dies.
name: Hitman
ability: Once per game, at night choose a player: guess their good character role, if correct they die otherwise you die.
